question:
Which of the following fauna is / are endemic to India?
  1. Nilgiri Langur
  2. Asiatic Lion
  3. Namdhapa Flying Squirrel
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Asiatic Lion (Panthera leo persica) is although found only in Gir Forest yet, it is<u> not classified as endemic to India. </u>
